website_summaries.verdict: Clean, modern design made from stainless steel that's strong and sleek.
pros: This stylish rack is also perfect as a jewelry storage option for the bedroom or bathroom
Customers raved about how sturdy it is despite carrying weight
cons: Might be considered a bit pricier and design won’t fit homes with a more rustic or classic slant

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’m liking the Spectrum Euro mug holder because I finally have a place to put Christmas mugs for the short time frame we use them. There’s never enough space in our cupboards, so this works perfect. Not a fan of the cluttered look tree mug holders have in general, but I have no complaints with this piece as it serves it’s purpose. I can fit 6 good size mugs on it.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara

customer_reviews.title: It holds coffee cups without falling over!
customer_reviews.text: With a large enough base and made of steel, this thing does it's job! It doesn't teeter or feel like an arm is going to break off nor will it loosen up after time- It's welded steel. BUY IT NOW!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid and hefty mug holder
customer_reviews.text: This is my third Spectrum branded product and the quality did not disappoint when this mug holder arrived. It's more than adequately solid and well constructed, with enough heft that I'm not concerned it will topple over. All that said, despite knowing how large the other Spectrum products were in relation to what I expected, I was still surprised how large this was. I'm definitely keeping it abs expect the chrome finish to hold up well into the future. I've uploaded a photo along with this review to get a sense of scale next to a can of soda.
customer_reviews.author: S. Benjamin

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected for price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is exactly what I wanted and even more sturdy than I expected for the price. It looks very sleek in my kitchen and really blends in with any decor. I am gifting it with the first of many coffee mugs to my boyfriend and I am proud of my gift. I was disappointed in the delivery as it arrived 2 days after it was guaranteed, but it is the holidays and I'm sure not perfect. This is the only time that has ever happened to me with Amazon and they were helpful and stayed in contact throughout the wait. I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: agilmore

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect addition to my stainless/ black theme. Much sturdier than appears in pic, heavy and bigger then appears in pic, yet still fits under cabinet. Helps alleviate the coffe mug shelf in my cabinet. These are heavy mugs, and confident it won’t easily be knocked over. Love it, well worth the price ! So happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: donna kraus

customer_reviews.title: A great mug tree.
customer_reviews.text: This mug tree is heavy duty, attractive and has a great base so it won’t tip. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: it is rusty and has many scratches
customer_reviews.text: It's very sturdy and looks exactly like the pic. The lowest holder can hold a large cup that is about 5.5' tall. However it has many scratches and dings all over, some are deep and big. I'd have kept it but there are rusty spots distributed throughout the piece and every welded joints is rusty and has a gap between the short bars and the main structure. I actually wanted a replacement but amazon do not offer replacement on this item so I had to return it. Because of many positive review here I wonder if I just happened to get the defective one.
customer_reviews.author: dezzie

customer_reviews.title: Strong, stable.
customer_reviews.text: I have had no problem with the sturdiness. Some reviews stated problem. I guess I got a good one. I’m pleased. Looks nice. Matched the hardware in my kitchen. What more could I want?
customer_reviews.author: Tom M

customer_reviews.title: well built
customer_reviews.text: the mug tree is very sturdy. The metal is substantial and very solid. Only thing I would change is maybe a bit taller so it would hold oversized mugs a bit better.
customer_reviews.author: JeffV

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy for lots of cups!
customer_reviews.text: I have several large coffee mugs that are very heavy and I was a little concerned about stability of the item when I ordered it. But, it is built well and has no problems keeping 6 mugs in place. No tipping over either! Great purchase...love it!
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Heavy enough to stand without tip over
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy the other cheap stand. They tip over if they’re too light. These are heavy and study and won’t tip over easily
customer_reviews.author: Anh P. Nguyen, MD

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive and sturdy mug holder
customer_reviews.text: Wanted something inexpensive but sturdy to display my Christmas coffee cups and this item was just perfect! Love that it holds up to 6 cups!

customer_reviews.title: Simple stand blends in.
customer_reviews.text: Good size, our 4 Irish mugs fit. The upturned bars seem safer than straight bars. Clean lines blend in to counter space.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it and how it looks. Holds our cups perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed. Clean look, sturdy & stable and holds large cups with no problem. At a great price. I would recommend it.

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it was intended to do. Only seems to work well for small mugs or espresso cups.

customer_reviews.title: Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. It holds 6 medium sized coffee cups with no tipping. I've seen other mug trees that look super-wobbly, but this has a wide base and has never felt like it would tip over.

customer_reviews.title: Good buy

customer_reviews.text: Works fine, feels a tad unstable but apparently just because of the light weight. It has never tipped over, so fine.

customer_reviews.title: Much better than it looks!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened up my package and lifted up the tree I immediately felt a much thicker, heavier item than I expected from the picture (which I had been worried about). My coffee cups are large, but the base on the tree is so thick and wider than the picture looks so it sits firmly on the counter. Very happily surprised!

customer_reviews.text: This item was very sturdy and great quality...we needed this to hang small shot glasses for display.

customer_reviews.text: Love this mug holder. I used it to display my holiday mugs and it was very pretty.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Mugs Needed a Home
customer_reviews.text: What to do with all those Christmas mugs that come out for December? Buy this little tree mug for your counter. It is sturdy, simple and stylish but not even noticeable once filled up with mugs. It was a cheap way to take care of my holiday mug clutter.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!!
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a new look to my kitchen/living space and it fits in very nicely with the other stainless steel appliances I have in my set up. The unit itself is sturdy and nicely built. Would buy this again in the future if the need arises for one more cup holder.

customer_reviews.title: nice product

customer_reviews.title: Coffee mug display
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for displaying my coffee mugs in my coffee bar!

customer_reviews.title: Chrome Cupholder Tree
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this mug tree because I had taken my mug rack off the kitchen wall. And wouldn't you know none of the stores think countertop mug trees are "necessary" anymore. Well, Amazon to the rescue!! I found exactly what I wanted, at a great price, and received it promptly. It is well constructed, not a flimsy thing at all; and looks great in kitchen. Who says husbands can't change kitchens?
customer_reviews.author: treehugger

customer_reviews.title: Liked it so much I bought a second.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these and another, similar stand. The other one was too lightweight -- if you put a single mug on it, it would fall over. This one is a lot heavier and sturdier. I liked it so much I bought a second one. It's also very nice looking -- very plain, which I like.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy Mug Holder
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product! It is solid in its design so it is able to hold heavy mugs and different sizes. I recommend you put smaller mugs on the bottom because there is not as much clearances. Also it a good size since it can hold up to 6 mugs.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect.

customer_reviews.title: It’s LEANING
customer_reviews.text: It’s leaning so bad! When I pulled it out of the box I thought I was crazy because I swore I bought a straight up and down mug tree. It’s probably a complete 75 degree angle. I don’t know if it’s sturdy enough to actually hold any mugs or if it’s just going to tip right over. Very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Brielle Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and nice chrome finish
customer_reviews.text: This is a very solidly built holder. It is heavy and very sturdy and have good weight and balance. Due to its weight it is less likely to tip over. The size itself lends it to be good for small to medium mugs. It will be difficult if not impossible to fit 6 large mugs in this stand. This is a great space saver in comparison to mugs taking up lot of counter/shelf space. The chrome gives it a very high end finish compared to other cheaper looking holder.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Patra

customer_reviews.title: Mugs don't fall off!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned many mug trees-this one is great - mugs actually stay on because each holder is slanted!

product_meta.title: Spectrum Diversified Euro 6 Holder, Countertop Mug Tree, Mugs & Tea Cup Storage Rack, Coffee Counter Bar Accessory & Kitchen Organizer, Small, Chrome
product_meta.description: Color:Chrome| Style Name:Mug HolderFree up valuable cupboard space with Euro 6-Mug Holder from Spectrum. The mug tree holds up to six of your favorite coffee mugs or teacups, and each branch tilts upwards to hold each mug securely. Create a countertop coffee station with the mug holder, or clear up cabinet space by moving extra mugs to your counter. Display your collection of teacups, or store your glass or ceramic coffee mugs on the counter. Mug tree holds cups by the handles, so the holder can accommodate a variety of cup sizes at once. The solid steel base sits evenly on the table without tipping or leaning. The clean, curved lines and fresh finishes look at home in a modern kitchen, yet the looped handle fits into a traditional design scheme. Equipped with stoppers on the end of the arms, the mug tree does not allow cups to slide off. The looped handle makes it easy to move the mug holder from your kitchen countertop coffee station to a hot chocolate station in your dining room and back again. Organize your tea supplies and coffee accessories near your mugs for easy access to your morning cup. Made of sturdy steel.
feature_bullets: INTRODUCE MODERN STYLE: With clean, smooth lines, this organizer inspires an up-to-date look that is fresh and contemporary. The modern finishes complement a variety of kitchen styles and color schemes, showing off your style in the best light.

HOLDS MUGS OF VARIOUS SIZES & SHAPES: Cups hang on the mug tree by the handle, accommodating any size of ceramic or glass coffee or teacup. Branches curve upwards to keep mugs securely in place. Create a countertop coffee station by keeping your mugs within easy reach, right next to the coffee machine or French press.

ORGANIZE YOUR COUNTERTOPS: Streamline your cabinets by relocating your mug collection to your countertops. Show off your favorite mugs without clutter. Store mugs vertically on this tree to save counter and cabinet space.

CONVENIENT CARRYING HANDLE: Move from countertop to coffee station and back again with the convenient carrying handle. The looped top is a stylish way to transport the mug tree from one place to another.
EASY CARE: To clean, wipe down with a damp cloth and towel dry as needed.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars552 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
specifications.Material Care Instructions: To clean, wipe down with a damp cloth and towel dry as needed.
